original_title: The Ace Hotel - A Film Poem By Hieu Gray
overview: The tradition of film and poetry melded together to create a dark and evocative exploration of an unrelenting cycle of primal love and lust.  Fantasy and reality collide as a woman plunges deeper and deeper into madness and ennui in the City of Angels.
title: The Ace Hotel - A Film Poem By Hieu Gray
